questionset.title: my first perl-quiz
questionset.abstract: Some questions and answers about perl.

quizentry.question: In which year was Perl 1.0 released?
quizentry.fullanswer: 1987 October 18 Perl 1.0 is posted to the usenet group comp.sources.
quizentry.hint: in this year Larry Wall was 33 years old.

quizentry.question: Who is the creator of Perl?
quizentry.hint: Perl was created by an american.

quizentry.question: Sort this operators after priority. Begin with the operator with highest precedence.
